channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report E-2023080662
item.description:
Report E-2023080662

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-02T06:14:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-21
  • City: NORTH LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that the freight had toppled and that 4 cases of oven & grill cleaner(NA1760) and that 15 of the inner poly one gallon bottles had released 15 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
